metadata.title: CVE-2021-47054 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bus: qcom: Put child node before returnPut child node before return to fix potential reference count leak.Generally, the reference count of child is incremented and decrementedautomatically in the macro for_each_available_child_of_node() and shouldbe decremented manually if the loop is broken in loop body.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
